body_text: I wrote the below comment first but looking at this now, I wonder if this whole section of logic that determines inner could be moved out to another function entirely. That may be too much abstraction when combined with the below comment, though. Open to thoughts.
body: I wrote the below comment first but looking at this now, I wonder if this whole section of logic that determines `inner` could be moved out to another function entirely. That may be too much abstraction when combined with the below comment, though. Open to thoughts.
